name: Double Hydra
description:
A simple game in a minimal art style composed of circles and components of circles. You control a two-headed dragon protecting his hoard of treasure from the heroes.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 26 Jam. The theme was "Minimalism". We ended up placing:

#56 Graphics #64 Overall #102 Innovation

Instructions
Up/Down or W/S: move
Left/Right or A/D: directional shooting
Space: flip

Credits
Vu Ha - Art
Rose Peng - Code
Johan Soriao - Audio
